comments.author: Brian Carr

comments.text:
Ya, know, they aren't really dissing them. They aren't saying "look how 
stupid New Zealanders are" or showing any hate. They are just dressing up 
as them because they think its cool to pretend. Being white, people think 
its fine to crack jokes about "whities" all the time, because we aren't 
seen as a "race" to allot of people. But I don't mind. I find it funny too 
sometimes. Just type "white people meme" to see what I am talking about. 
Lighten up, they're just dress-ups.

 I think apart of the problem with racism, is that there is allot of pent 
up anger for what happened in the past. So when someone dresses up as 
someone, even if they are just trying to show their fascination with that 
culture, people take it the wrong way and label it "racist". We need to be 
careful when we use that word. Its used so often, that if anyone even 
mentions another culture or says anything they don't like about someone who 
happens to be another race, people say its racist.

Racism is not when you do something or say anything about something or 
someone involving another culture. Its only racist when you make a 
judgment, bad or good, about a group of people, based  ONLY on their 
genetic heritage. So if I said a person was stupid because they were black, 
that would be racist. But if I said a person was stupid because they put a 
banana up their nose, and they happened to be black, that is NOT racist, 
because I said they were stupid because of WHAT THEY DID, not just because 
they were black. People really misuse this word allot.


In this example, people dressing up as native New Zealanders is not racist. 
If they were dressing up as New Zealander's and shouting "All New 
Zealander's are retarded!" and were making fun of them just for being a New 
Zealander, that would be racist.
 
Basically, if you make a claim or decision regarding another culture, based 
solely on the way they were born, on their culturally identifyable genetic 
makeup, that is racist. But just interacting with another culture is not 
racist.

comments.text:
Fuck you. Not all germans were Nazis. In fact, my grandfather was a German 
Jew, and survived Krystalnacht because they were warned by an SS officer 
who served as a doctor with my Great Grandfather (also Jewish) in WWI. 
Also, they make good cars, are innovators in green technology, and the 
makers of airbuses. And don't forget Hot Dogs! This American is happy to 
have them as allies.
